dentalclinic.title:
Dental Clinic
Project
dentalclinic.text: * the following images are just used as an example for this portfolio. they belong to carreiradentalclinic.pt

markers.title: Door with concealed hinge in high gloss lacquer

content.title: Counter
content.text: The Diamond Service Desk is inspired by the irregular shape of the jewel. This high-gloss lacquered furniture is the perfect element to frame the clinical space and serve patients comfortably.

content.title: Door
content.text: High-gloss lacquered door, with hidden hinge detail to frame the space in an elegant and discreet way.

content.title: Panel
content.text: A contemporary wall panel, very spacious and high gloss lacquered. An elegant choice that guarantees a hidden and discreet organization system.

content.title: Bookcase
content.text: Bookcase with an open structure, high gloss lacquered and with built-in lighting, the ideal complement to complete the decor of the waiting room.

content.title: Door
content.text: Pivot door in the waiting room lacquered in high gloss, harmoniously framed in the middle of the shelves with an open structure. A contemporary and elegant door that fits perfectly into the clinic.

content.title: Furniture
content.text: Office furniture, high gloss lacquered, with an extensive storage system, designed to meet the needs of the dental clinic.

woodland.title:
Village Building
Project
woodland.text: * the following images are just used as an example for this portfolio. they belong to woodlandvillage.ch

content.title: 37 mountain chalets designed to the millimeter
content.text: The development consists of 37 mountain chalets with all the interior carpentry: kitchen furniture, wardrobes, bathroom furniture, doors, among others.

content.title: WC cabinet
content.text: WC cabinet, lacquered in matt black, designed to frame the space harmoniously and guarantee a complete organization system.

content.title: Kitchen Counter
content.text: A matte black Zimbabwe granite countertop, resistant to any scratch, easy to clean and maintain.

content.title: TV cabinet
content.text: Television cabinet, lacquered in matt black, quite spacious, with the perfect aesthetic to complement any living room.

content.title: MÃ³veis Cozinha
content.text: Thermolaminate kitchen furniture, resistant to any intervention and easy to maintain. Designed to meet the needs of its residents, they offer various storage solutions.

content.title: Built-in Refrigerator
content.text: Built-in refrigerator in thermolaminate, which blends ideally with the rest of the kitchen space, ensuring a clean and modern environment.

markers.title: Wardrobe with 2 sliding doors with soft-close matt lacquered

content.title: Peninsula Kitchen
content.text: Thermo-laminated furniture peninsula, with a matt Zimbabwe black granite top. It integrates the space in a balanced way and is easy to clean.

content.title: Headboard
content.text: Bed headboard lacquered in matt black, designed to sublimely frame the central piece of the room and complement the remaining decorative elements.

content.title: Wardrobes
content.text: Wardrobe lacquered in matt black, with two soft-close sliding doors, ideal for completing the space and creating a relaxing and comfortable bedroom.
